parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference as defined in swUserPreferenceRoutingToggle_e

parameters.name: OnFlag
parameters.description: True to turn on, false to turn off

title: IRoutingSettings.SetRoutingUserPreferenceToggle
description: Sets whether the specified routing user preference is turned on or off.
signature:
void SetRoutingUserPreferenceToggle( 
   System.Int32
UserPreferenceValue
,
   System.Boolean
OnFlag
)

parameters.name: UserPreferenceValue
parameters.description: User preference as defined in swUserPreferenceRoutingToggle_e

parameters.name: OnFlag
parameters.description: True to turn on, false to turn off
